directions: Place the cucumber and honeydew melon chunks into a large bowl. Whisk together the vegetable oil, lemon juice, and sugar in a small bowl until well blended. Pour dressing over the cucumber and melon; mix well. Allow to rest for 1 hour before serving.
ingredients: 3 large cucumbers - peeled, seeded, and cut into 1-inch pieces
1  honeydew melon - peeled, seeded and cut into 1 1/2 inch chunks
title: Honeydew and Cucumber Salad
